Posts.Content: Thank you Elaine will speak to the nurse on Monday xxx
Posts.Title: Pic line covers

Posts.Content: Hi Lyndsey I have had a waterproof one on prescription from my Gp.Thank you for your kind words and advice .I just want to get started now so I will finish .Good luck with  your remaining treatment love and hugs we all need it xxx
Posts.Title: Pic line covers

Posts.Content: Hi ladies does anybody know where you can get Pic line covers from .I have a waterproof one but I just wanted one for everyday wear. Thank you for all your previous advice due to start my chemotherapy on monday and feeling more relaxed.xx
Posts.Title: Pic line covers

Posts.Content: Thank you all for your replies and positive thoughts.I just want to get started now so as I can get finished love to all you you ladies x
Posts.Title: Chemotherapy and hair loss

Posts.Content: I am going to start chemo in 2 weeks I am having FECT .Can anybody tell me of their experience regarding hair loss.I don't want to use the cold cap but wondering if anybody has kept their hair and if you can give me any tips .
